dcterms:creator: Catalin Ionescu
Dragos Papava
Vlad Olaru
Cristian Sminchisescu
dcterms:description: A large dataset containing various types of human motion sequences annotated with 3D ground truth extracted using motion capture systems. The 3D human skeleton in Human3.6M is modeled as a 17-joint skeleton, with specific subjects used for training and testing.
dcterms:title: Human3.6M

dcterms:creator: Dushyant Mehta
Helge Rhodin
Dan Casas
Pascal Fua
Oleksandr Sotnychenko
Weipeng Xu
Christian Theobalt
dcterms:description: A dataset that features more complex scenarios including indoor, green screen, and outdoor scenes, with a training set containing 8 activities performed by 8 actors and a test set covering 7 activities.
dcterms:title: MPI-INF-3DHP
